title: Big Pharma Is Making HOW MUCH Off Of The Vaccines!?!
cleaned_text:
Up to You.

We don't live in a democracy. And our freedom is disappearing fast.

I don't want to be ruled by hypocrites, whores, and war criminals.

What about you? Time to push back against the corporate oligarchy.

And its multitude of minions and lackeys.

opengraph.title: Big Pharma Is Making HOW MUCH Off Of The Vaccines!?! | The Greanville Post
opengraph.description: JIMMY DORE—If you were worried about how COVID vaccine producers Moderna and Pfizer would make out financially as the pandemic seems to wane, you can rest easy. Moderna tallied $5.9 billion of Covid vaccine sales in the first quarter, blowing out revenue and profit expectations, while Pfizer expects to make record revenues of $98-102 billion this year. Jimmy discusses the obscene profits these companies are enjoying during a time when so many other businesses and individuals are suffering.
